title: Bloomberg Markets: Senators Explore `Plan B' Health Care Bill
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Senators Explore `Plan B' Health Care Bill
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Kevin Whitelaw Congressional Editor Bloomberg News Discussing more than half a dozen Republican and Democratic senators have discussed alternatives to the embattled GOP health-care bill, even as Majority Leader Mitch McConnell said he plans a vote next week to muscle the Obamacare repeal measure through the Senate.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
